name: FossFLOW
description: FossFLOW is a powerful, open-source Progressive Web App (PWA) for creating beautiful isometric infrastructure diagrams. Built with React and the Isoflow library, it features auto-save, offline support, multilingual interface, custom icon import, and server-side storage.

notes.text: FossFLOW runs entirely in the browser. Server storage is enabled by default for persistent diagram storage.
